author: IGN
description:
Grounded 2 gets a new update that makes things a whole lot scarier and hairier. Meet AXL in this new Grounded 2 trailer for the action-adventure game. The Hairy and Scary update for Grounded 2 brings the giant tarantula boss AXL to Brookhollow Park. In the new update, build better than ever with the new BUILD.M feature, explore upgraded Buggy support, suit up in the new Praying Mantis armor set, and more. 

The Hairy and Scary Update is live now in Game Preview for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC, and Xbox Cloud, and in Early Access on Steam. It is also available via Game Pass Ultimate and Game Pass PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Grounded 2 - Official Hairy and Scary Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers is available now on PC (via Steam, Epic Games Store and Microsoft Store). Watch the Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers trailer for this 4X strategy MMO game. The PC launch features full cross-platform compatibility, with all content, events and features available across devices. Additionally, the Godzilla Evolution limited-time event is available now for one week, featuring a new recruitable monster, the Solarcharged Coralmouth, an Evolved HQ skin along with other cosmetic rewards, a new crafting equipment set powered by Electromagnetic Minerals, the Coralmouth Boss Brawl in Campaign Mode and a new Survival Trail Expedition.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers - Official PC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
When we got to play Jurassic World Evolution 3, we were most excited to see that it finally offers the extremely deep customization and personalization features we've come to expect from developer Frontier. Oh, and baby dinosaurs too. Previewed by Leana Hafer

#IGN #Gaming
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3: The Final Preview

author: IGN
description:
We left My Hero Academia: All’s Justice impressed with the fisticuffs, but also its dedication to building a world where you’re actively being a hero, not just punching something. Like fighting games themselves, being a superhero isn’t just about fights; the stuff between brawls matters, too. Previewed by Will Borger.

#MyHeroAcademiaAllsJustice #Gaming #IGN
title: My Hero Academia: All’s Justice Wants You to Be a Hero, Not Just a Fighter

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Age of Wonders 4 trailer for a deep dive into what you can expect with the Expansion Pass 3, which will include four content releases in a single bundle, with the first DLC "Comic Wanderer," available immediately. The new Expansion pass brings narrative content, vampires, and nomads. The vampire-themed Thrones of Blood DLC will be available on November 11, 2025. 

Age of Wonders 4's Expansion Pass 3 is available now on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Age of Wonders 4 - Official Expansion Pass 3 Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Pokémon Legends: Z-A in this new teaser trailer for the upcoming action RPG. Catch, battle, and Mega Evolve when Pokémon Legends: Z-A launches on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 on October 16, 2025.

#PokemonLegendsZA #Gaming #IGN
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Pulsebreaker trailer for this upcoming survival horror game inspired by classic survival horror PS1-era titles. Players step into the boots of Soren Eckhart, a lone survivor navigating a city consumed by a mysterious outbreak. Scavenge scarce supplies, solve environmental puzzles, and fight to survive against grotesque mutated foes while uncovering the truth behind why the city has become infected. Pulsebreaker will be available on PC.
title: Pulsebreaker - Official Gameplay Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Echograph announcement trailer for the upcoming isometric perspective-switching survival horror game. In Echograph, you photograph ghosts, crack environmental puzzles, manage limited resources, and unravel the mystery behind a generational family curse. The Echograph trailer takes you into its unsettling world and dangerous, spectral threats. Echograph will be available on PC. 

You can wishlist Echograph on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3460960/Echograph/

#Echograph #Gaming #IGN
title: Echograph - Official Announcement Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Command the battlefield, master your skills, and discover the untold legend of Ramza Beoulve as he and his childhood friend Delita chart a course through this tumultuous age in the Kingdom of Ivalice. Watch the Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles launch trailer for this strategy RPG remake. The new Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles trailer gives you a peek at the story and gameplay.

Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles is available now on Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at gameplay and more from Projekt Z: Beyond Order in this brutal new trailer for the upcoming first-person zombie shooter game. Set around World War II, take on fast-paced missions or explore the terrifying island in Free Roam mode as one of four survivors, each with their own unique abilities and role in 4-player co-op. Shoot, loot, craft, survive. Projekt Z: Beyond Order will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#IGN #gaming
title: Projekt Z: Beyond Order - Official Gameplay Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the Gameplay Trailer for After Lights Out, a first-person psychological detective puzzle game developed by POQI STUDIO. Players will explore an evershifting home that only shifts in the night. Make use of house lights and tools to discover a sinister truth in a particular room. After Lights Out is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: After Lights Out - Official Gameplay Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Gameplay Trailer for CONTAMINANT, a third-person action horror game developed by M3at Bicycle. Players will explore an alternate post-Soviet timeline to uncover long-lost secrets of a family. Step into the shoes of Maria to partake in brutal combat, extensive puzzles, and more in CONTAMINANT, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: CONTAMINANT - Official Gameplay Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Cosmic Fear is a disturbing Lovecraftian horror experience from the author of The Land of Pain and The Alien Cube. Live your worst nightmares in the darkness of the forests, explore alien ruins and seemingly abandoned villages to uncover the secrets that torment your soul.
Cosmic Fear is set to be released on PC in the first quarter of 2026. Visit Steam to add the game to your Wishlist and download the demo.
title: Cosmic Fear - Official Demo Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Psycho Dead is a third-person survival horror game centered on Elixia, a mysterious girl with psychic powers, who must escape a secret laboratory infested with grotesque and monstrous creatures. Explore a sci-fi setting filled with mystery and danger, where terror lurks at every corner, and uncover the chilling truth behind the horrific incident. Psycho Dead will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Steam in 2026, and a demo is out now on Steam.

#IGN #gaming
title: PSYCHO DEAD - Official Demo Launch Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Get a look at the Announcement Trailer for Maid of Sker, a VR version of the hit first-person survival horror game developed by Wales Interactive. Players will find themselves in a desolate hotel with a defensive sound device at the ready and completely in virtual reality. Live through the eyes of a 1898 Elisabeth Williams who must make good use of stealth, strategy, and silence to survive a demented supernatural mystery. Maid of Sker is coming to PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2) and Meta Quest in November 2025.
title: Maid of Sker VR - Official Announcement Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Teemo, The Swift Scout' Dev Update Gameplay Overview for 2XKO, a 2v2 fighting game developed by Riot Games. Players can get the rundown on Teemo with champ designers Kyohei “MarlinPie” Lehr and Alex “Blinkity” Jaffe. Teemo is an unorthodox character with a small stature, but with plenty in his kit to keep the pressure up and remain competitive. Fight as Teemo in 2XKO, launching into Early Access on October 7 for PC.

#2XKO #Gaming #IGN
title: 2XKO - Official 'Teemo, The Swift Scout' Dev Update Gameplay Overview

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Free Update & Metalhead DLC Launch Trailer for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate, a 2.5D action co-op roguelike developed by Super Evil Megacorp. Players can now access the Metalhead DLC, bringing the hard-headed character playable for the first time, bringing an all-new long-range playstyle with a laser cannon, landmines, and more. A new update is also available for the game, offering the all-new blood-pumping arcade mode with three new biomes alongside a suite of improvements to audio, visuals, performance, and more. The Free Update & Metalhead DLC for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Apple Arcade, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming #TMNT
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate - Official Free Update & Metalhead DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a 14-minute look at gameplay from Operator, the newest Survivor coming to third-person roguelite Risk of Rain 2 in its Alloyed Collective expansion pack later this year. The Operator uses Alloyed Collective's newly added drones to enhance his own abilities. Learn more and/or wishlist the expansion on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2781620/Risk_of_Rain_2_Alloyed_Collective/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Risk of Rain 2: Alloyed Collective – Exclusive Operator Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Multiplayer Maps Flythrough Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the next installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can check out a sneak peek of all of the game's 16 launch maps for core Multiplayer, including new maps and returning maps from past Call of Duty games like Express, Hijacked, and Raid. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official Launch Multiplayer Maps Flythrough Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In the Halloween special, “A Little Fright Music,” Brian and Stewie realize there is a shortage of quality Halloween songs, so they set out to write a hit, and Peter and the guys discover that lying about trick or treating can have deadly consequences.

The Halloween special, the first of the two Hulu Exclusive specials, will premiere Monday, October 6 on Hulu.

#IGN
title: Family Guy: Hulu-Exclusive Halloween Special Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Minecraft has entered The Copper Age. 

Watch the latest Minecraft trailer to see what to expect. With The Copper Age, you can express yourself in every shade of copper as you transform this versatile metal into tools, light sources, smart storage, and even mechanical companions known as copper golems.

#IGN #Minecraft #TheCopperAge
title: Minecraft - Official The Copper Age Trailer

author: IGN
description:
When their boat is sunk while crossing the Timor Sea during World War II, a young troop of Australian soldiers must find a way to survive the harsh seas on a quickly shrinking life raft. Hundreds of miles from anywhere, they must confront interpersonal conflicts, enemy attacks, and the advances of one very large, very hungry great white shark. 

The thriller stars Mark Coles Smith, Joel Nankervis, Sam Delich, Lee Tiger Halley, Sam Parsonson, Maximillian Johnson, Tristan McKinnon, and Aswan Reid.

From Kiah Roache-Turner, director of Wyrmwood and Sting, comes this uniquely terrifying tale. Well Go USA will release Beast of War in theaters and on digital on October 10, 2025.
title: Beast of War - Exclusive Clip (2025) Mark Coles Smith, Joel Nankervis,

author: IGN
description:
Trap House is centered on a team of elite DEA agents whose rebellious teenage children use their parents’ own tactics—surveillance, infiltration, and non-lethal weapons—to rob a ruthless drug cartel. 

In addition to Dave Bautista, the film also stars Jack Champion (Avatar: The Way of Water, Scream VI), Sophia Lillis (It, Dungeons & Dragons), Tony Dalton (Better Call Saul), Whitney Peak (Gossip Girl (2021), Hocus Pocus 2), Kate Del Castillo (Cleaning Lady), Zaire Adams (FreeRidge), and Bobby Cannavale (The Irish Man, Ant-Man). 

The film is directed by Michael Dowse (Stuber).

#IGN
title: Trap House - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Dave Bautista, Jack Champion

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Release Date Announcement Trailer for My Hero Academia: All's Justice, an upcoming 3D anime story-driven fighting game developed by Byking Inc. 

Players will engage in 3v3 battles with popular characters from the hit anime series. Fight as Deku, Todoroki, Ochaco, and more heroes and villains from the show while exploring iconic locations and fighting in The Final War in Story Mode. My Hero Academia: All's Justice is launching on February 6 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #MyHeroAcademia #Anime
title: My Hero Academia: All's Justice - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
You’ll need more than nine lives where you’re going. 

Watch the latest Dead by Daylight trailer for the asymmetrical multiplayer horror game to see what's available with The Nyaight of the Living Cat Collection, which features new outfits for The Oni and Yui Kimura. The Nyaight of the Living Cat Collection is available now in the in-game store.

#IGN #DeadByDaylight #DBD
title: Dead by Daylight - Official Nyaight of the Living Cat Collection Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get the rundown with the Season 4.5 Update Dev Vision Vol. 10 Video for Marvel Rivals, the free-to-play action team-based shooter developed by NetEase Games. 

Players can get all the information on what's to come with Season 4.5 with Creative Director Guangguang laying out the new Daredevil's introduction to the game, new Team-Ups, a new Mode, Event, and more. Season 4.5 for Marvel Rivals is launching on October 10 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Rivals #Daredevil
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Season 4.5 Update Dev Vision Vol. 10 Video

author: IGN
description:
Anna "Grim" Grímsdóttir calls retired super-spy Sam Fisher back into action many years after the events of the Splinter Cell games in this exclusive clip from episode 2 of Netflix's upcoming animated series, Splinter Cell: Deathwatch. Season one premieres on Netflix on October 14.

#IGN
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch: Exclusive "I've Missed You, Sam" Clip (ft. Liev Schreiber, Janet Varney)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Ornithomimus Dinosaur Showcase Trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, a dinosaur park management simulation game developed by Frontier Developments. 

Players will be able to tend to the needs of the Ornithomimus, a bird-like dinosaur with long hind limbs and a large body, translating to 'bird mimic'. Ensure their survival in Jurassic World Evolution 3, launching on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #SimulationGames
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Ornithomimus Dinosaur Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get your latest look at Deathground, the 1-4-player co-op survival horror game that tasks you with surviving against hostile dinosaurs. It launches into Steam Early Access on October 7. Wishlist it here if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200770/Deathground/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Deathground: Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
LEGO Party reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on Xbox Series X. Also available on Xbox Series S, PlayStation 4/5, PC, and Nintendo Switch.

"LEGO Party doesn’t completely reinvent the tried-and-true Mario Party formula, but it does introduce some welcome tweaks to its structure, a uniformly high quality collection of minigames hard-tuned for hilarity, and an enjoyably silly game show-style presentation that’s yet to overstay its welcome. The four game boards on offer might be a few less than Super Mario Party Jamboree’s collection, but the transformative nature of their layouts brings welcome variety and surprise to each session, and the considerable minifig customisation options are a joy to tinker with. Creative, colourful, and a consistent crack up, LEGO Party is purpose-built to turn any boring old night into a block party filled with belly laughs."
title: LEGO Party Review

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Foundation Event Teaser Trailer for Reaper Actual, a first-person open-world action MMO RPG shooter developed by Distinct Possibility Studios. Players will take the fight to a shared space with hundreds of players on the battlefield of Marova. Build up a base, complete missions, and more with the Foundation Event kicking off on October 6 for players to be some of the first to drop into the game. Reaper Actual is launching into Early Access in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Reaper Actual - Official Foundation Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Trailer for Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer, the adventure platformer developed by Headless Chicken Games. Players will embark on a magical quest with Rudolph, Hermey, Clarice, and Yukon Cornelius across a suite of challenges and adventures inspired by the classic film. Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#RudolphTheRedNoseReindeer #Gaming #IGN
title: Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer - Official Launch Trailer
